price: 44. Diggah Yalli sinam tut mayadluma umaane keenit ossee kee hinnay maqaane keenik daggoyse yakkeemit, kinnih immay sinam isi nafsi isih tadlume koroosannuu kee Yallih amri cinaanamat.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَظۡلِمُ ٱلنَّاسَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha lā yaẓlimu al-nāsa shayan walākinna al-nāsa anfusahum yaẓlimūna
